content:
(slightly off topic) so, I just reviewed https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/pull/6464, left a reply to a comment as part of the review and added a review summary as well.
Is it normal that GH is showing my comment twice now, because that seems slightly annoying? I think I will just separate replies and review comments from now on :neutral:
Did you click Add single comment or Start a Review? Just guessing here.
Yeah, I clicked 'Start a review' and then replied to the comment as part of the review (if that explanation makes sense)
Yes, that's a GH "feature". pretty annoying. You can't even resolve the duplicated review comment, without resolving the whole thread.
oh, alright! then it's just some weird UX to keep in mind :sweat_smile:
I will start a review to leave a comment on your comment-review, reminding you that your comment is a review, not just a comment.
